meanings.definition: A variant of a microorganism distinguished by its antigenic structure.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different serovars of the bacteria to understand their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The lab identified multiple serovars of the virus in the samples collected from the patients.
meanings.sent3: The serovars of the germ were like a team of tiny superheroes, each with its own special power.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, serovars are like distinct flavors in a vast microbial buffet.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the serovars of the fungus looked like a colorful mosaic of tiny shapes.

meanings.definition: Different strains of a microorganism that are classified based on their surface antigens.
